certifications.title: Introduction to CyberSecurity and Cybersecurity Essentials

projects.name: Cryptoverse
projects.description: Developed a cryptocurrency platform using React and CoinGecko API, handling over 100,000 API requests efficiently. Improved data visualization speed by 40% through integration of Material UI and Chart.js, enhancing user experience. Enhanced user interaction and engagement by creating dynamic components with Reacts flexibility and efficiency. Ensured seamless performance under high demand, facilitating access to comprehensive cryptocurrency data smoothly.

projects.name: NoteIn
projects.description: Spearheaded adoption of MVC architecture, ensuring separation of concerns to bolster the applications integrity. Employed DAO for systematic note storage and ensured data access through efficient utilization of Room Database. Utilized Kotlin to develop a modern, responsive UI that enhances user interaction and experience. Developed a notes app with features for creating, editing, and updating notes, providing users with efficient management.

projects.name: GetAlong
projects.description: Built a social media platform using Firebase Backend, revolutionizing user authentication and session management. Ensured real-time updates and data consistency through backend synchronization with Room Persistence Library. Increased user engagement by 20% with push notifications, and reduced server response time by 25%. Fostered a responsive and engaging user experience by maintaining up-to-date content and seamless interactions.

experiences.description: Developed Temperature Converter and Calculator apps using Android Studio and Java, ensuring an intuitive interface. Created Quiz and Stopwatch applications to showcase layout skills and proficiency in Android development practices. Identified and resolved various technical issues in Android applications, ensuring smooth user experience and proper functionality.

Developed a To-Do List web app and a Simple Calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring responsive design. Utilized Microsoft Visual Studio Code for efficient collaboration and project management, adhering to agile work processes. Demonstrated understanding of web development skills by creating modern, responsive applications hosted on GitHub, working seamlessly.

full_output.name: P MOHAN KUMAR
achievements_and_awards: Achieved semifinalist position in TechGig Code Gladiators, demonstrating exceptional coding skills and problem-solving.
Volunteered as a valued Sponsor Team Member and contributed actively to the success of the Department symposium.
